Jun 3, 2022

#1,566

Strangely, after I uploaded it, the game is only showing 1/4 of the image. Do you know what the problem would be?

The "frame" seems to be off then, I made a post about this a while back. Try pulling it through SVGOMG and see if that fixes it.

EDIT: Here:

GT7 SVG request thread.

Seems like your text wasn't converted to paths (it actually was, dunno why there was text info in the code tho) and something is wrong with the flag as well. I'll fix it, give me a few minutes. EDIT: Try these Hey @Nuschel01 , do you remember what you did to fix it? I might have found the same...

Last edited: Jun 3, 2022

12

Guys, I guess I am not doing this right, so I was wondering if I could get one of you talented artist to create me a racing sticker or livery. I have tried adding my request a couple times to no avail, so I assume I am not using the right format or something.

I just need a simple sticker that would read MRI Racing maybe a cool font maybe a cheeky racing flag in back ground...

Black or white fonts don't matter to me.

Thank you in advanced.

Jun 5, 2022

#1,588

Hi guys,

Back with a couple request for the new livery contest. Can you please help me with these?

1. Cam Shaft logo, 1 color is fine, no need for the white outline

2. CashCloud, in those colors please. Cash in dark blue and cloud in a light blue. As for the logo, can you leave out the app style border? just the shapes are fine

3. Gemballa racing, as you see it please Gemballa in white and racing in red

4. Gemballa, i can find it in GT7 as a hollowed out logo, but i need it like here in white

5. Gemballa symbol, this is the hardest one probably. Getting as close as possible will make me happy already.

Thanks

Attachments

Cam shaft logo.png

cashcloud-app-logo.jpeg

gemballa racing.png

gemballa-logo-png-transparent.png

Gemballa-symbol.jpeg

WRP001

GTP Race Admin

11,921

California
